definitions.definition: Showy brilliance that may stop a person from thinking clearly.
To confuse the sight of by means of excessive brightness.
definitions.example: Dazzled by the headlights of the lorry, the deer stopped in the middle of the street.

definitions.definition: To render incapable of thinking clearly; to overwhelm with showiness or brilliance.
definitions.example: The delegates were dazzled by the originality of his arguments.

definitions.definition: To be overpowered by light; to be confused by excess of brightness.
